A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was entertaining enough as a stand alone film with incredible effects. Unfortunately\, it obviously is not a stand alone film. The film takes a strange pride in having no connection to the universe as it has been described or to the development of its characters. I laughed out loud at the amount of inconsistencies as they flew by\, one after another. But after leaving the theater\, I’ve been left with nothing but the disappointment of a film I cannot logically connect to the saga we all fell in love with. At least non-Star Wars fans got a kick out of it.
